description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cq3tp","text":"detailed protocol to receive mouse brain tissue from US to Australia including storage and sectioning ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a2n1j","text":"Archive mice brains for storage ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cc7nb","text":"Sample arrive in the delivery room (4°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9fkac","text":"Move samples from the delivery room to PC2 laboratory. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3as10","text":"Cross check tissue ID with shipping log","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4nv1l","text":"Inspect for floating tissue in 30% sucrose and discoloration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bl8is","text":"Inspect for floating tissue in 30% sucrose and discoloration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"85qh5","text":"Prepare labelled (date of arrival and tissue ID) 50ml falcon tubes filled with new sucrose solution (30% sucrose, 0.02% sodium azide).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2nnup","text":"Pour old sucrose out and gently place tissue into the new falcon tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Storage and sectioning of mouse brain tissue
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"87pjn","text":"Store tubes in 4°C on shaker overnigh.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"brper","text":"30% sucrose solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ovmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9d8bv","text":"Dissolve 300g of sucrose in 300mL of distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"66l22","text":"Add 100mL of 10x PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bhlck","text":"Adjust final volume to 1L with distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i9tg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4vs58","text":"Add 2mL of 10% sodium azide to solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8us6l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bivaj","text":" Mix well until solution is homogenous and store in 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jr8j","text":"1X Phosphate Buffer (1M)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"vop","text":"In 1.8L of dH2O, add 38.7g of NaH2PO4.H2Oand 101.9g of Na2HPO4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8h5sf","text":"Mix solution until it is homogenous and store in 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nr31","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hvl1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ae0r1","text":"Cryoprotectant Solution for Mouse Brain (1L)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2g9rp","text":"Add 300mL of glycerol, 300mL of ethylene glycol, 100mL 1xPhosphate\nBuffer, and 300mL of dH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":90,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4t7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"91p14","text":" Mix solution overnight on the stirrer at RT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc0lg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Sucrose solution/PB buffer/Cryoprotectant solution for mouse brain (1L)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"er6nn","text":"   \nStore solution at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6pd88","text":"Mice brain sectioning and storage ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4oes7","text":"Tubes are filled with cryoprotectant to 90% of volume: 8 tubes for ST sections, 8 tubes for SN sections, 1 tube for PF sections. One tube without cryoprotectant is prepared for leftover tissues. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3e6ib","text":"Create a rectangle mould using metal plates to fit the mouse brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2mnm5","text":"Pour Clear O.C.T Compound Embedding Medium to the mould up to ¼ of the volume. Ensure that the medium is evenly distributed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4ip","text":"Place the mould filled with embedding medium inside the Epredia‱\nCryoStar‱ NX50 chamber and use the quick freeze option to quickly freeze the\nmedium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CD256EAB9D5E11EE9FCB0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CD256EAB9D5E11EE9FCB0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5d3mq","text":"Move sample from the cool room to RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"54f38","text":"Retrieve the mould with frozen embedding medium and pour more medium up\nto ½ of the volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1gd7k","text":"Gently place the mouse brain to the mould using forceps, submerging it\nin embedding medium. Adjust the orientation as needed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bk5ql","text":"Slowly pour more embedding medium on top of the mouse brain until it is\ncompletely submerged in embedding medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8seek","text":"Place the mould back inside the Epredia‱ CryoStar‱ NX50 chamber and\nquickly freeze it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E958B5409D5E11EE9FCB0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E958B5409D5E11EE9FCB0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3viot","text":"Lift the frozen mould from the chamber and mark the front orientation of\nthe brain by drawing a line on the frozen embedding mould using a sharpie","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"596l4","text":"Pour a 1cm diameter dollop on the circular cutting plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"228of","text":"Release the mould and place the frozen tissue on the cutting plate,\nfront orientation up","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9n5l4","text":"Place the tissue and cutting plate into the chamber, quickly freezing it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cn9r","text":"Place the frozen tissue and cutting plate to the cutting table. Adjust\nthe orientation so that the mould is parallel to the cutting blade.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75jfe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6eone","text":"Cut PF with 20um of thickness and place it in the PF vial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a07mo","text":"Cut ST with 20um of thickness and sequentially place them in 8 vials,\nrepeat the process until SN is reached","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pafv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jvnt","text":"Change section thickness to 30um to cut SN and sequentially place them\nin 8 vials, repeat the process until the cerebellum is reached.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvrqj","text":"Release the frozen cerebellum and cutting plate from the cutting table","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74jja","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1a1ii","text":"Remove the frozen cerebellum from the cutting plate and place it into the vial for\nleftover. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4eahj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jhj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: tissue cutting and storage
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5koh8","text":"Vials are then placed into designated boxes and stored in -20°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: mouse brain storage and sectioning
